chart_description: This chart displays the performance of Netdata's SQLite3 cache in terms of cache hits, cache misses, cache spills and cache writes per second.

dimension_descriptions.cache_hit: The rate at which queries were satisfied by the SQLite3 cache.
dimension_descriptions.cache_miss: The rate at which queries had to be fulfilled from the SQLite3 database because they were not found in cache.
dimension_descriptions.cache_spill: The rate at which cache entries were evicted from memory to disk in order to make space for new entries.
dimension_descriptions.cache_write: The rate at which cache entries were being modified or created.
